introduction.clause_text: This CONTRACT OF LEASE, made and entered into this ___day of August, 2003 at the City of Makati, by and between: __________, of legal age, married and residing at ______, civil_code: Article 1643, Article 1687

parties.clause_text: and hereinafter referred to as the LESSOR, and __________, also of legal age, married and residing at _____, and hereinafter referred to as the LESSEE.

lease_term.clause_text: The LESSOR hereby leases to the LESSEE the house and lot located at ______, for a period of ______, commencing on ______ and ending on ______.

term_of_lease.clause_text: That the lease shall be for a period of one year from December 17, 2002 up to December 17,2003;

rent_payment.clause_text: That the LESSEE shall pay a monthly rental of FIFTY THOUSAND PESOS (P50,000.00), Philippine Currency, payable every 16th day of the month

security_deposit.clause_text: That the LESSEE upon ________________________________________________ PESOS (_______________) representing two (2) months deposit and one (1) month advance. That the deposit shall not be considered as payment for rental but will be reimbursed by the LESSOR upon the termination of this contract, unless the leased property suffers damages or the LESSEE has unpaid utility and water bills in which case, said bills and damages will be paid out of the deposit

utilities responsibility.clause_text: Electric and water bills shall be for the account of the LESSEE, based on the monthly meter readings.

use of premises.clause_text: The leased premises shall be devoted exclusively for residential purposes only.

improvement_and_alterations.clause_text: All improvements require prior consent of the LESSOR, and any improvement that cannot be removed shall become the property of the LESSOR.

repairs_and_damage.clause_text: Expenses for repairs arising from willful and knowing damage caused by the LESSEE shall be shouldered by the LESSEE

subleasing prohibition.clause_text: The leased premises shall not be subleased to any person or entity without the written consent of the LESSOR.

fail to surrender premises.clause_text: If the premises are not surrendered upon expiration of the lease, the LESSEE shall be liable for all damages suffered by the LESSOR.

condition upon return.clause_text: The LESSEE agrees to return the premises in good condition, subject only to reasonable wear and tear, without delay

lessors_right_to_offset_arrears.clause_text: In case of unpaid rental arrears, the LESSOR may take possession of the LESSEEâ€™s tangible and valuable property to offset the arrears without judicial action.

abandonment_of_premise.clause_text: If the premises are abandoned for one (1) week without notice and while the LESSEE is in default, the LESSOR may consider the premises legally abandoned and take possession thereof.

rental_escalation.clause_text: The LESSOR reserves the right to increase the rental rate by ten percent (10%) after one (1) year if the contract is renewed by mutual agreement.

cleanliness_and_conduct.clause_text: The LESSEE is obliged to observe cleanliness and maintain a peaceful condition inside and outside the premises.

compliance_and_sanctions.clause_text: The LESSEE warrants having read and understood the contract and agrees to comply; violations may result in ejectment and other legal sanctions.
